content:
<asn_d6> So today I took a stab at updating EIP-4844 to bring the cryptography up-to-date with consensus-specs: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/5649

For those who did not know, the cryptography of the EIP has been outdated for the past months (not wrong, but the code was ugly and would not run).

Anyhow, I took the controversial approach of linking to consensus-specs to avoid code dup, which I invite feedback on. Also, the PR won't merge even if we wanted it to, because eth-bot considers it an error to have non-relative links.
